welcome.title: Welcome to Itineramio!
welcome.subtitle: Stop repeating the same thing to every guest
welcome.description: Create a digital manual with all the information your guests need. WiFi, check-in, appliances... all in one place.

features.0: Forget about repeating the same answers

zones.title: Unlimited zones
zones.subtitle: WiFi, Check-in, Washing Machine, Kitchen...
zones.description: Create all the zones you need with videos, images or text. Your guests will have all the information organized.

multilang.title: Manual in multiple languages
multilang.subtitle: Spanish, English, French
multilang.description: Your manual is automatically displayed in the guest's language. Reach visitors from all over the world.

whatsapp.title: WhatsApp in one click
whatsapp.subtitle: Direct connection with your guests
whatsapp.description: If they have a problem, they can contact you via WhatsApp with a single tap. No searching for numbers or copying links.

announcements.title: Important announcements
announcements.subtitle: The first thing they see when entering
announcements.description: Add highlighted announcements so your guests know the essentials as soon as they land on your manual.

hero.title: Simple and transparent pricing
hero.subtitle: Pay only for the properties you use. No hidden costs. No long-term commitments.

whyChoose.title: Why choose Itineramio?
whyChoose.subtitle: The complete solution to manage your vacation property information

fairPrice.title: Fair pricing
fairPrice.description: Pay only for what you use. More properties = better price per unit.

noCommitment.title: No commitments
noCommitment.description: Try 15 days with no commitment. No penalties or questions asked.

instantSetup.title: Instant setup
instantSetup.description: Get started in minutes. 15-day evaluation with no credit card required.

comparison.title: Competitor comparison
comparison.subtitle: More competitive pricing with more features included

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.trialQuestion: What does the evaluation period include?
faq.trialAnswer: The 15-day evaluation period includes full access to all platform features. No credit card required to get started.
faq.changePropertiesQuestion: Can I change the number of properties at any time?
faq.changePropertiesAnswer: Yes, you can add or remove properties whenever you want. The price adjusts automatically and changes are prorated on your next invoice.
faq.annualDiscountQuestion: Are there discounts for annual payment?
faq.annualDiscountAnswer: Yes, you get a 15% discount if you pay annually instead of monthly.
faq.couponAnswer: You can enter a coupon code during registration or in the pricing calculator. Coupons can offer percentage discounts, included months, or fixed discounts.
faq.paymentMethodsQuestion: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.paymentMethodsAnswer: We accept credit/debit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), SEPA Direct Debit for Europe, and soon Bizum for Spain.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.subtitle: Join hundreds of owners who already trust Itineramio
cta.disclaimer: No credit card required â€¢ 15-day no-commitment trial

billing.requiredDescription: Before continuing with your purchase, you need to complete your billing data. This is required to issue legally valid invoices under Spanish regulations.
billing.planSaved: Your plan selection will be saved automatically
billing.returnAfter: You will return here after completing your data
